transforms.code: return [{'value': i, 'label': value.getValueAt(i,"name")} for i in range(value.getRowCount())]

messageHandlers.script:
if(payload['result'] is not None and len(str(payload['result'])) > 0):
		self.props.value = round(float(payload['result']))

config.script:
if self.parent.custom.enabled:
		system.perspective.openPopup(
				"calc_store_add",
				"1_TEMPLATES/Calculator",
				{
					'calcStrInitial': str(self.getSibling("NumericEntryField").props.value),
					'messageHandler': "storeTransactionAddResult",
					'popupId': "calc_store_add",
					'forcePositive': True
				},
				title="Add Transaction")

messageHandlers.script:
if(payload['result'] is not None and len(str(payload['result'])) > 0):
		self.props.value = round(float(payload['result']))

config.script:
if self.parent.custom.enabled:
			system.perspective.openPopup(
					"calc_store_deduct",
					"1_TEMPLATES/Calculator",
					{
						'calcStrInitial': str(self.getSibling("NumericEntryField").props.value),
						'messageHandler': "storeTransactionDeductResult",
						'popupId': "calc_store_deduct",
						'forcePositive': True
					},
					title="Deduct Transaction")

logger = system.util.getLogger("CampusStore.AddTransaction")
				
	category = self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("InputContainer").custom.categorySelected
	addVal = self.parent.parent.getChild("AddFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.value
	deductVal = self.parent.parent.getChild("DeductFlex").getChild("NumericEntryField").props.value
	participantId = self.view.params.participantId
				
				# Ensure a participant is selected
	if(participantId is None or len(str(participantId)) <= 0):
		logger.warning("Transaction can not be added as no participant is selected")
		return
				
				# Ensure a category is selected
	if(category.id is None):
		logger.warning("Transaction can not be added as no category is selected")
		return
				
				# calculate delta and ensure it is allowed for selected category
	logger.info("%s %s" % (addVal, deductVal))
	delta = int(addVal) - int(deductVal)
	if((delta > 0 and not category.canAdd) or (delta < 0 and not category.canDeduct)):
				logger.warning("Transaction of category %s doesn't permit a transaction value of %d." % (category.name, delta))
				return
					
				# Insert transaction
	system.db.runNamedQuery(
		"Participants/CampusStore/InsertTransaction",
		{
			'participantId': participantId,
			'transactionPoints': delta,
			'categoryId': category.id
		})
				
	self.parent.parent.parent.parent.getChild("TransactionHistory").refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.view.refreshBinding("custom.participant.points")

value.race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Island
Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Island

transforms.code:
tableData = []
	
	for iRow in range(value.getRowCount()):
		
		col_category = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'Category')
		col_t_stamp = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'timeCreated')
		
		delta = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'TransactionPoints')
		col_add = delta if delta > 0 else None
		col_deduct = abs(delta) if delta < 0 else None
		
		col_total = value.getValueAt(iRow, 'TotalPoints')
		
		row = [col_category, col_t_stamp, col_add, col_deduct, col_total]
		tableData.append(row)
	
	headers = ["category", "t_stamp", "add", "deduct", "total"]
	return system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, tableData)

messageHandlers.script:
if(payload['participantId'] is not None):
		self.view.params.participantId = payload['participantId']
